action.name: getProductDetailList
action.query: SELECT `product_id`, `product_name`, `school_stage_name`, `course_grade_name`, `course_subject_name`, `course_term_name`, CONCAT(`publisher_short_name`, `product_version_name`) AS `pubversion`, `is_free`, `is_package`, pt.`product_status_id` AS `product_status_id`, `product_status_name` FROM `product` pt LEFT JOIN `school_stage` st ON pt.`school_stage_id` = st.`school_stage_id` LEFT JOIN `course_grade` g ON pt.`course_grade_id` = g.`course_grade_id` LEFT JOIN `course_subject` s ON pt.`course_subject_id` = s.`course_subject_id` LEFT JOIN `course_term` t ON pt.`course_term_id` = t.`course_term_id` LEFT JOIN `product_version` v ON pt.`product_version_id` = v.`product_version_id` LEFT JOIN `publisher` pu ON pt.`publisher_id` = pu.`publisher_id` LEFT JOIN `product_status` ps ON pt.`product_status_id` = ps.`product_status_id` WHERE (pt.`product_name` = :product_name) AND (st.`school_stage_name` = :school_stage_name) AND (g.`course_grade_name` = :course_grade_name) AND (s.`course_subject_name` = :course_subject_name) AND (pu.`publisher_id` = :publisher_id) AND (v.`product_version_id` = :product_version_id) AND (ps.`product_status_id` = :product_status_id) ORDER BY `product_id`
